page.title: 05THE VALLEY
page.content: There is a place we go by the Manchester Ship Canal we call "the valley". There are lots of thistles and grass around the place, and a lot of trees. There is a fence to climb over and a slope to go down to some stones right by the canal. Sometimes you see ships going by, such as "The Consortium","The Percy Dawson","The Dovedale", and boats with "Trader" in their name, like "Seaborne Trader" and "Mersey Trader". Sometimes the canal smells rotten and at other times it smells alright. When we hang about in the Park and see a ship in the canal we race down there on our bikes to beat it to the valley. Sometimes we race the waves made by the ships. A friend of mine was hit once by air-gun pellets shot from the Irlam side by kids hiding from us.
